string-array.name: quotes
string-array.item: One of the great ironies of life is this: he or she who serves almost always benefits more than he or she who is served.|Gordon B. Hinckley
The best way to cheer yourself up is to try to cheer somebody else up.|Mark Twain
Be somebody who makes everybody feel like a somebody.|Kid President (Robby Novak)
Freedom is never given; it is won.|A. Philip Randolph
Give your hands to serve and your hearts to love.|Mother Teresa
Everybody can be great. Because anybody can serve.|Martin Luther King, Jr.

Success is not just the crowning moment, the spiking of the ball in the end zone or the raising of the flag on the summit. It is the whole process of reaching for a goal and, sometimes, it begins with failure.|Erik Weihenmayer
Still, like air, I rise.|Maya Angelou
Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.|Confucius
Consult not your fears, but your hopes and your dreams.|Pope John XXIII
We always kept in our hearts the most noble, beautiful feeling that sets human beings apart: hope.|Manel Loureiro
Where hope grows, miracles blossom.|Elna Rae
